summary: In Providence's Italian neighborhood, Federal Hill, five young men face their choices as they become adults. Bobby, who's sort of dim, owes $30,000 to a counterfeiter who's demanding ... See full summary Â»
cast: Nicholas Turturro|Anthony DeSando|Libby Langdon|Michael Raynor|Robert Turano|Jason Andrews|Phyllis Kay|Biagio Conti|Michael Corrente|Briggs Doherty|Armen Garo|Jimmy Landi|Frank Vincent|Jane Kinsey
title: Federal Hill
